page.title: 07MILLBROOK VILLAGE(CONT)
page.content: there are 25 in the Reception Class;23 in the Middle Infant Class and 22 in the Top Infant Class.Junior1 has 21 children and in Junior2 there are 17.Junior 3 has 27 pupils and there are 28 in Junior 4.There are 224 children in the whole school.Not all children who attend the school live in Millbrook some come from Carrbrook,some from Brushes and some from the new estate across the road.A few come from Buckton Vale. St.Raphael R.C.Primary School was built in 1968 and is of a traditional 'box' design .This is a Roman Catholic School because when the church was built they wanted a catholic school to go with it.They school has 190 children.There are 40 in the nursery and 22 in the Reception Class.In the Middle Infant Class there are 26 and 18 in the top class.Junior1 has 19 and
